welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hollister, a charming city known for its small-town charm and big heart! Get ready to explore our beautiful community and enjoy all it has to offer. We're excited to have you here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hollister Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hollister Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salinas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Salinas Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Watsonville Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Watsonville Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
